text:
Champions League
Real Madrid - Galatasaray streaming: where to see the match?
Real Madrid receives Galatasaray in Santiago Bernabeu for the fourth day of the Champions League. Discover how to watch this meeting in streaming.
06 Nov 2019, 04:20 by Antoine Chirat



Eden HazardClub previous: ChelseaCompensation: 100 million eurosIcon Sport



Luka JovicClub previous: Eintracht FrankfurtIndemnity: 60 million eurosIcon Sport



Eder Militao Previous club: FC PortoCompensation: 50 million eurosIcon Sport



Ferland MendyClub previous: Olympique LyonnaisIndemnity: 48 million eurosIcon Sport



RodrygoClub previous: SantosCompensation: 45 million eurosIcon Sport



Alphonse AreolaClub previous: Paris Saint-GermainIndemnity: none (ready) Icon Sport



Takefusa KuboClub previous: FC TokyoIndemnity: noneIcon Sport

Real Madrid: all the recruits of the transfer window 2019




Europe is back in Santiago Bernabeu! On behalf of the fourth day of the Champions League, Real Madrid Zinedine Zidane welcomes the Turks of Galatasaray. In the first leg, Karim Benzema's teammates had taken their first advantage by defeating Germany's Toni Kroos 1-0. Tonight, a win would bring them closer to qualifying.







Real Madrid - Galatasaray streaming




Karim Benzema + 7 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

The match between Real Madrid and Galatasaray is broadcast on Wednesday, November 6 on RMC Sport 2 for French television from 21:00 French time. A channel accessible by subscription to a limited number of audiovisual actors. Mainly SFR and Canal +. So you can not access it via your Internet operator for example, there is an alternative solution: the 100% digital offer of RMC Sport (or OTT). A subscription available at a price of 9 euros per month for mobile or fixed subscribers of SFR, 19 euros per month with commitment / 25 euros per month without commitment for non-subscribers.
Discover below the list of supports to watch RMC Sport streaming:


iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch


Android


PC / Mac via Internet browser type Chrome, Safari, Microsoft Edge

Chromecast, Apple TV, Samsung Smart TV, Nvidia Shield, Philips with Connect TV option




The schedule and results of group A




Rapha√´l Varane + 7 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

1st day - 18 September:

18h55: Club Brugge 0-0 Galatasaray
9 pm: PSG 3-0 Real Madrid

2nd day - 1st of October:

18h55: Real Madrid 2-2 Club Brugge
9 pm: Galatasaray 0-1 PSG

3rd day - 22nd of October:

9 pm: Club Bruges 0-5 PSG
9 pm: Galatasaray 0-1 Real Madrid

4th day - November 6th:

9 pm: Real Madrid - Galatasaray
9 pm: PSG - Club Brugge

5th day - November 26th:

18h55: Galatasaray - Club Brugge
9 pm: Real Madrid - PSG

6th day - December 11th:

9 pm: Club Brugge - Real Madrid
9 pm: PSG - Galatasaray

The classification of group A




Radamel Falcao + 7 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

2- Real Madrid - 4 pts (-2)
3- Brugge FC - 2 pt (-5)
4- Galatasaray - 1 pt (-2)
